author: ate
msg: Fixing age old JS2-238: Subject object is abandoned after the JAAS authentication, *on Tomcat* at least.
I discovered that Tomcat JAASRealm implementation actually will take use the Jetspeed provided user principal for request.getUserPrincipal().
As we already provide the UserSubjectPrincipal wrapper, getting hold of the Jetspeed provided subject is easy and so doesn't need to be loaded/created twice (on Tomcat).
